mapper.insert: insert into dt_instance (dt_instid, user_id, task_id, instance_id) values (#{dtInstid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{instanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select dt_instid, user_id, task_id, instance_id from dt_instance
select * from dt_instance where user_id = #{userId} and task_id = #{taskId} and instance_id = #{instanceId}
